title: Strategies for Enhancing Mathematics Learning Engagement in Blended Online Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen self-directed learning using digital devices in a blended learning environment centered on project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners increase interaction frequency with peers and instructors by over 70% using discussion forums and feedback systems provided within the LMS.
Learners consistently perform assessment-linked online activities (quizzes, learning journals) to achieve a final project completion score of 85 or higher.
Learners monitor their learning engagement patterns using LMS analytics tools and implement weekly learning plans with over 90% adherence.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
